lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Several legislators said the tapes, if it is confirmed that they exist, could prove invaluable to the special House and Senate committees that were created in January to investigate Reagan's most damaging political crisis.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Reagan, Vice President George Bush, (fired National Security Council aide) Lt Col Oliver North, (former National Security Adviser) Adm John Poindexter, (former White House Chief of Staff) Donald Regan and other key figures in the Iran-contra arms scandal."
